Cassiniâ€™s Chrome plugin helps you collect visual references as page screenshots or partials anywhere on the web. Right here from the plugin, you can save these screenshots to any set in your Cassini account.

The chrome plugin becomes an essential part of the design process by integrating visual research, allowing website QA and also allowing collected screenshots to be imported directly into creator workspaces like Figma and Sketch.
